posts.post_content:
Condition is overall good: the BATTER has a heavy corner crease + staining, the three-player card is trimmed down a little. Back of pitcher pc is stained.

If you want some further information on this embossed series of postcards dated 1906-1909 check this link:

[url]https://www.dodgersblueheaven.com/2012/10/collection-vintage-1905-09-embossed.html[/url]

Please pm - thanks for looking.

peter
